WorkItem.ClosedComment: updated WPF example to flex data models
WorkItem.Description: Start building out full examples including simple editor application in WPF as real-world application/start template for developers.

Comments.Message: As the Task for creating craft import has been pushed to 0.5.0 This task will be brought into 0.2.0 as a pre-release task for 0.2.0. Additional versions of this issue will come up from time to time to force an update to one ore more examples.

Updated existing examples to use new API. Make orbit is now only a few lines!

For comprehensive examples KSPEditor will be built out as a simple vanilla file manager/editor.
